item.description:
Part 2 of our Fall Speaker Series:
Ditching Your Boss? Practical Steps to Starting Your Own Business

Cost: FREE

Location: Western New England College

Speakers: Lynn Goodhue, Christine Burns

Being a woman in business means balancing your family life with your career, while dealing with the challenges of being successful and keeping it all together. Hear from the women who have found a way to make it work while getting the bills paid, taking the dog to the vet, picking up the kids from school, showing up at networking events, and staying sane through it all.
item.how_to_find_us: The series will be held in the School of Business. Once in the building the gaurd will direct you to the correct room.
item.name: Finding Balance & Creating Time-Saving Systems
